name: SeaPolice
description:
Donate to #TeamSeas here! About

Hey, y'all! I'm BigManCloudy from Silent Earth Games! I made a short game for the #TeamSeas gamejam SeaJam hosted by PolyMars and Barji.

I had exams at school so I made this in like 5 days.  Then YoYo Games canceled my GameMaker Studio 2 subscription for some reason and I'm lazy so I re-subscribed 1 day before the jam ended.

Credits

All art, music and code is by me. Sound effects made using sfxr.  Music was made using BoscaCeoil and Audacity.

Also ik that the OST sounds like The Office theme and that is a complete co-incidence.
